resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106831</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106831</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206994</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Splish-Splash: Daily Use of Water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Splish-Spritzen Sie: Täglicher Gebrauch des
Wassers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Splish-Éclaboussez : Utilisation 
quotidienne de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Splish-Espirre: Uso diário da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Splish-Spruzzi: Uso quotidiano di acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σπλησχ-παφλασμός: Καθημερινή χρήση του ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Splish-Salpique: Uso diario del agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">helps students learn about the daily use of water in Kenya and Ghana as they read stories by Peace Corps Volunteers and compare the stories to their own daily use of water.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hilfen Kursteilnehmer erlernen über den 
täglichen Gebrauch des Wassers in Kenia und in Ghana, während sie 
Geschichten durch Friedenskorps-Freiwilliger lesen und die Geschichten
mit ihren Selbst täglicher Gebrauch des Wassers vergleichen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants d'aides se renseignent sur 
l'utilisation quotidienne de l'eau au Kenya et au Ghana pendant qu'ils
lisent des histoires par des volontaires de corps de paix et comparent
les histoires à leurs propres utilisation quotidienne de l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os estudantes das ajudas aprendem sobre o uso 
diário da água em Kenya e em Ghana enquanto lêem histórias por 
voluntários do corpo de paz e comparam as histórias ao seus 
próprias uso diário da água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gli allievi di aiuti imparano circa l'uso 
quotidiano di acqua nel Kenia e nel Ghana mentre leggono le storia dai
volontari della Peace corpo e confrontano le storia ai loro proprie
uso quotidiano di acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βοηθά τους σπουδαστές να μάθουν για την καθημερινή 
χρήση του ύδατος στην Κένυα και την Γκάνα δεδομένου ότι 
διαβάζουν τις ιστορίες από τους εθελοντές ειρήνης Σώμα και 
συγκρίνουν τις ιστορίες με την καθημερινή χρήση ύδατός τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los estudiantes de las ayudas aprenden sobre el 
uso diario del agua en Kenia y Ghana mientras que leen historias de 
los voluntarios del cuerpo de paz y comparan las historias sus las 
propias uso diario del agua.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206994</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106831</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/splish-splash-daily-use-of-water</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
